      • getAccountBalance

        public static java.math.BigInteger[] getAccountBalance(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        This method is used to get the balance of an account.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - is a accountnumber pointing to a specific account.
        Returns:
        an array containing the kroner-value of the account on place 0 and the amount of oere in place 1 in the array.

      • getCustomerAccounts

        public static java.util.List<Account> getCustomerAccounts(int customerId)
        This method creates a DAO-object to the Customer-table in the database. It uses that connection to query for a list customers. Another DAO-object is created to the account-class. It then uses the first object in the customer-list to query for all of its accounts.
        Parameters:
        customerId - The specific integer for a customer in the database.
        Returns:
        a list containing all of the accounts that the customer has.

      • getAccount

        public static Account getAccount(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - The accountnumber is needed to get the account-object with the specified accountnumber.
        Returns:
        Account-object with specified accountnumber.

      • getAllAccounts

        public static java.util.List<Account> getAllAccounts()
        Returns:
        a list of all the accounts in the database.

      • addAccount

        public static boolean addAccount(int customerId,
                                 java.lang.String accountType)
        This method creates an account associated with an already existing user in the database. It utilises the randomNumber()-method to create a random accountnumber. It also checks if the accountnumber is available or not. It determines the interest of the account based on what type of account it is. If the account is a "Brukskonto", the account is set as a "main" account. This should also be set by the users existing accounts, but it was to timeconsuming to implement.
        Parameters:
        customerId - is needed to associate the new account to the customer.
        accountType - This sets the type of the account. It is usually "sparekonto" or "brukskonto". It determines the rent on the account and also the rules applying to it.
        Returns:
        It returns a boolean (true/false), so that the user can know if the account is succesfully mad or not.

      • randomNumber

        public static java.lang.String randomNumber()
        This method is used to generate random accountnumbers.
        Returns:
        a number created of two random numbers with values between 100000 and 999999

      • checkAccount

        public static boolean checkAccount(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Returns true/false based on if the account with the specified accountnumber exists or not.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - is used to get the account with the specified accountnumber.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • updateMain

        public static boolean updateMain(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                 int main)
        Used to update the status of the account. The account can be 0(main account) or 1(not main account)
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - is used to get the account in DB with the specified accountnumber.
        main - indicates if the account is the main account of the user.
        Returns:
        boolean
